ModMetaData.name: Safe Temperature
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
Improves the safe temperature mechanic by forcing pawns to immediately drop what they're doing to go wait in a safe temperature area. Also forces them to stay in the safe temperature area until they are no longer shivering/initial heatstroke.
